briefTitle: Evaluation of Efficiency in Cancerology of New Technologies as Telemedicine and Conected Objects (e-DomSanté)
officialTitle: Evaluation of Efficiency in Cancerology of New Technologies as Telemedicine and Conected Objects (e-DomSanté)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Quality of life of the patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women more than 18 years old
* Treated for an advanced metastasis breast cancer
* Who live far from their comprehensive cancer center in the Landes department

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women who are not able to understand the study because of psychiatric disease
